original_text: As we were going to the place of prayer, we were met by a slave girl who had a spirit of divination and brought her owners much gain by fortune-telling.
korean_text: 우리가 기도하는 곳에 가다가 점치는 귀신 들린 여종 하나를 만나니 점으로 그 주인들에게 큰 이익을 주는 자라

sentences.original_text: As we were going to the place of prayer,
we were met by a slave girl
who had a spirit of divination
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여종은 점술의 영을 가지고 있었고,

sentences.original_text: and brought her owners much gain by fortune-telling.
sentences.korean_translation: 점술로 그 주인들에게 많은 이익을 가져다주었습니다.
